description: Try our easy to follow Latticed Rhubarb & Apple Pie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Apple pie & tart,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Soy free,Apple,Sesame free,Peanut free,Rhubarb
name: Latticed Rhubarb & Apple Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 bunch rhubarb, washed, trimmed and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Pastry: Place flour, butter and icing sugar into a food processor and process until mixture resembles fine breadcrumbs.

Add egg and 1-2 tablespoons of iced water. Process until dough forms into a smooth ball. Remove and wrap in plastic. Refrigerate for 30 minutes to chill. You can store pastry in the freezer for up to 3 months. Fillings:

Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Melt the butter in a frying pan over low heat. Add rhubarb, apple, caster sugar and cinnamon. Cook for 3-4 minutes until apple softens. Transfer to a bowl. Sprinkle with almond meal. Cool.

Divide pastry in half and roll out 1 portion on a lightly floured work surface to fit a 24cm pie dish. Carefully transfer pastry into the dish and trim excess and reserve. Add the fruit filling to the pastry.

Roll out remaining pastry and using a fluted cutter cut into 1.5cm wide strips. Moisten edge of base pastry with a little water. Lay strips over the top of the filling, weaving, to make a lattice. Press edges to seal. Re-roll pastry and cut out leaf shapes. Add to lattice to decorate. Brush with milk and scatter over caster sugar.
Bake pie for 45 minutes until pastry is golden. Serve with custard.
